author: Austin Whaley
comment: On my new watch. ASUS ZenWatch 2. The ambient mode looks horrible on the AMOLED screen. I had an LG G Watch with a LCD screen and it worked fine. The buttons don't work and can't change the color with the tap. It seems like none of the settings apply except color changing on the phone
title: I love the watchface and bought premium but not working right

author: Patrick Trant
comment: I love the look of the watch face and even bought Premium.  However, that was a disappointment.  Once enabled, you can turn off the weather icon/updates and there is no unread notifications icon, which many of the newer watch faces have.

author: Himanshu Oberoi
comment: I feel like i wasted my money on this watchface. Installed it on my moto360 2nd gen.battery level drops at a very faster rate  as compared to other watchfaces. Moreover many bugs as mentioned in other comments. Waste of money
title: Battery sucker

author: Cory Wilson
comment: Looks good but the premium options are real buggy.  Uncheck "change color on tap" and it still changes color on tap. Color changer in app doesn't work until I change the face and reapply it. Ok Google in center doesn't work.

author: jatin kapoor
comment: It isn't showing me any steps all it shows is 0 steps please fix that. I have a moto 360 1st Gen.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

Please check is google fit connected in settings app

Regards

title: I love the face that's why I bought it but please fix one thing

author: Bradley Yensan
comment: I loved the design so I paid for premium. Unfortunately there exist some irritating limitations. The watch face color toggle in settings no longer works; I cannot lock in my selected color, and always risk changing it by touching the watch face. The ability to activate "Ok Google" by tapping the watch face also does not work. Furthermore, the weather forecast does not even display current day's forecast--only the next several days. I have no idea what the high or low will be later on today. Not worth the $1
title: Needs update

author: MYSTICmayonaise
comment: the watch face is pretty neat, looks nice, shows battery life and has short cuts which are nice.  But, all the options seem to be broken, there's a "change color on tap" option that cycles to a random color watch face when you tap the watch, which is extrenly annoying and is still doing it with the option off.  Short cuts work fine most of the time, but they will completely stop working (but still show on the watch) for no reason, and I have to reset the app settings everytime to fix it  And after spending $1 (not a lot I know) I expect the premium options to be premium and work.

author: Justin Flynn
comment: I used to love this watch face, and even bough Premium, but with the fact that it's gotten buggier and buggier as time goes on, it almost seems like it's been abandoned. I'm also experiencing the color changing on touch even after disabling the option and it won't even show up on my watch after upgrading an LG G6. Please update this watch face, cause I want to keep using it

Had high hopes for this watch face, but unfortunately it has too many bugs.  The step counter doesn't sync and the weather also doesn't apply location, so it isn't accurate.  I do like the look, just too bad it doesn't function correctly.

author: Melissa Baatz
comment: So far this is a decent watch face. I like that it doesn't kill a lot of my battery. It would be nice if this utilized the flat tire on the moto 360 instead of having part of it disappear at the bottom/ where the 6 is. Like have the face be fill whether it has a flat tire or not
title: Not bad

author: Andrew Fermin
comment: Using it on my LG Urbane, I noticed the premium options have a couple of glitches. I think it might be the phone app, not my watch, since changes take forever to happen on my watch

author: Paul Molitor
comment: I like the watchface, but the companion app on the phone keeps crashing in the background (about once every 2 days). it should not even be running in the background.
title: what does the companion app do in the background?

author: Kristina Lapp
comment: I really like the look of this watch face, unfortunately, it will not install on my lg style. Not sure if it's not compatible with this watch as it's very new or with wear 2.0, but I'll re assess if it becomes compatible.

author: Diane Levasseur
comment: Bought this watch and upgrade so that the watch face would stay on long enough to take a pulse or respiration. Chose 60 seconds but disappears consistently after 5 seconds.
title: Time on does work

author: John Bowes
comment: This is a great watch face but I'd like to have the option of more shortcuts than just the 3 slots and be able to select any installed wear app. I'd also like to see more indicators at once because I'd like to see date, weather, wind speed, steps and battery at the same time or some selection of them
title: Good but I'd like more options

author: Doug Ross
comment: Bought the premium version. .....BUT the watchface just won't install on my LG R Watch. Can I have a refund please??  Tried again. Says it's installed but it does not show up on my watch LG G Watch R. So please give me a refund ..... or explain why not!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you installed from your watch or phone device? Also, please send us an email it will be more easy to help you.

author: Dheepak Kumaar
comment: I like the watch face but I'm not able to apply it to my watch. It's neither showing in the Android wear app nor is it in the list of watch faces in the settings of my watch. What do I do?

author: Craig Evans
comment: Hi,  I like the face but none of the shortcuts work on my Michael Kors Access. Could I have a refund on my order please. Order number is GPA.3387-6347-7089-64455. Thanks, Craig

author: Ramiro Loeza
comment: Please add support for sync with Google Fit data to the steps counter. I see no option in this app, or in the Fit app to connect Cool Circle.

author: Alan Thewlis
comment: Purchased the premium app & it didn't give me the interactive options on the watch face.. Waste of money :(

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, Alan have you checked premium option? What version of Android Wear you have on the watch?

author: Andrea Rivera
comment: Does not appear on my moto 360 2nd generation. Useless app

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, you need to install watchface from Wear Store located on the watch.

author: Christopher McLarnon
comment: Downloaded From the play store, paid for premium features and done as suggested in the description and resynced apps through android wear. However, the watch face has not synced to my android wear device despite trying this a number of times.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, install the watch face directly from your watch.

author: Glenn Ormesher
comment: Paid for twice and still doesn't show steps or weather.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have  you tried to change weather provider?

title: Doesn't work!

author: Joe Bradshaw
comment: I really like this app but I had to reset my watch and after that nothing I try gets the cool circles app to show up in Android Wear.

author: José Sobe
comment: I like this app but I would like to see more selection in the apps shortcuts there, like Shazam, Google's messenger, Google's slides. Etc.
title: Could improve

author: George Willeboordse
comment: I resynced the Android App. The watch face that is installed in my LG6 will not show in the app or watch. Please advise.

author: Aeden Hunter
comment: I bought the premium features, but they're not working. Please give me a refund ASAP.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what doesn't work for you? Send us the Order number.

author: Trina B.
comment: Can't change from Celsius on free version. Uninstalled.

author: Joel LeJune
comment: Nice look with great options....but paid for shortcuts on watch face that don't work....
title: Nice, but...

author: Calum Crick
comment: Watch updated and now interaction is locked behind paywall.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

Please check is interactivity enabled.

Regards

title: Used to be good

author: Andreas S
comment: ...it has been my favourite watch face since I got my watch!

author: Junaid Qureshi
comment: Great looking watch face with many different color options.

author: Ådne Holen
comment: I love this watchface. I wish for premium for Christmas💖
title: Love it

author: Mike Gailey
comment: Best battery life on moto 360

author: Kriz Manov
comment: Best watch face ever!

author: Phil Steadman
comment: By far my favourite

author: Yousef Al.Balushi
comment: Nice

author: Marco Pacheco
comment: I love this face, but the recent update no longer stops the changing colors with pressing the center. It used to be it had to be checked to change to random colors. But now it does it regardless.
title: My favorite watch face

author: Prince Alabi
comment: This is one of my favorite watch faces but there is a bug which does not allow you to disable the "change colours on tap" button
title: Nice but 1 bug

author: Bogdan Jarcau
comment: This does everything I need it to do.  UPDATE: Why is the weather not updating anymore even though it is enabled in the app?
